DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare safety , tolerability , efficacy voriconazole anidulafungin combination versus voriconazole alone pediatric subject age 2 17 year invasive aspergillosis .
DOC.brief_title: Voriconazole And Anidulafungin Combination For Invasive Aspergillosis In Pediatric Subjects
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis proven , probable , possible invasive aspergillosis . Hematologic malignancy allogeneic hematopoetic stem cell transplant . Sarcoidosis , aspergilloma , allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis . Chronic invasive aspergillosis . Receipt antifungal treatment 96 hour . Severe liver dysfunction .
